newsitem.title: UK: Euromoney posts record H1 profits.
newsitem.headline: Euromoney posts record H1 profits.

text.p: British financial publisher Euromoney Publications Plc said on Friday its first-half profits hit record levels, boosted by strong performances from its global training business and specialist magazines.
Euromoney's pretax profits rose by 5.0 percent to 12.0 million stg for the first half to March 31.
Excluding a year-ago gain of 1.5 million stg, pretax profits surged 21 percent in the first half.
Euromoney said the results justified an increase of 1.75p in its interim dividend to 15.75p per share.
However, the company boosted its dividend by 4.0p to 18.0p due to its decision to reduce the difference between its interim and final payouts.
Euromoney's shares were marked up 90p at 1525 by 0720 GMT.
